mapper.insert: insert into moneybook(moneybook_name, moneybook_pw, insert_date) values(#{moneybook_name}, #{moneybook_pw}, #{insert_date})
mapper.select: select m.moneybook_name, m.moneybook_pw, a.authority_name from moneybook as m inner join authority as a on m.moneybook_name = a.moneybook_name where m.moneybook_name = #{moneybook_name};
select moneybook_name, insert_date from moneybook order by insert_date desc
